text: Martin Birch (27 December 1948 – 9 August 2020) was a British music producer and sound engineer. He was well known for engineering and producing albums by British rock bands including Deep Purple, Rainbow, Fleetwood Mac, Whitesnake, Black Sabbath, Blue Öyster Cult, and Iron Maiden. He was born in Woking, Surrey. Birch died on 9 August 2020, at age 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British record producers Category:British audio engineers Category:British businesspeople Category:People from Woking
title: Martin Birch
